amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consisted of the text of the "Hometown Heroes Survivors Benefits Act of 2003".

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeLay.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
